title: Solar Power Prediction Using Machine Learning. (arXiv:2303.07875v1 [cs.LG])
abstract: This paper presents a machine learning-based approach for predicting solar power generation with high accuracy using a 99% AUC (Area Under the Curve) metric. The approach includes data collection, pre-processing, feature selection, model selection, training, evaluation, and deployment. High-quality data from multiple sources, including weather data, solar irradiance data, and historical solar power generation data, are collected and pre-processed to remove outliers, handle missing values, and normalize the data. Relevant features such as temperature, humidity, wind speed, and solar irradiance are selected for model training. Support Vector Machines (SVM), Random Forest, and Gradient Boosting are used as machine learning algorithms to produce accurate predictions. The models are trained on a large dataset of historical solar power generation data and other relevant features. The performance of the models is evaluated using AUC and other metrics such as precision, recall, and F1-score. T

Title: Solar Power Prediction Using Machine Learning. (arXiv:2303.07875v1 [cs.LG])
Abstract: This paper presents a machine learning-based approach for predicting solar power generation with high accuracy using a 99% AUC (Area Under the Curve) metric. High-quality data from multiple sources, including weather data, solar irradiance data, and historical solar power generation data, are collected and pre-processed to remove outliers, handle missing values, and normalize the data. Relevant features such as temperature, humidity, wind speed, and solar irradiance are selected for model training. Support Vector Machines (SVM), Random Forest, and Gradient Boosting are used as machine learning algorithms to produce accurate predictions. The models are trained on a large dataset of historical solar power generation data and other relevant features. translated_abstract: 本文提出了一种基于机器学习的方法，使用99%的AUC（曲线下面积）指标高度准确地预测太阳能发电量。该方法包括数据收集、预处理、特征选择、模型选择、训练、评估和部署。从多个来源收集高质量的数据，包括天气数据、太阳辐照度数据和历史太阳能发电量数据，通过去除异常值、处理缺失值和标准化数据进行预处理。选择温度、湿度、风速和太阳辐照度等相关特征用于模型训练。支持向量机（SVM）、随机森林和梯度提升被用作机器学习算法产生准确的预测。模型在大量历史太阳能发电数据和其他相关特征的数据集上进行训练。使用AUC和其他度量标准，如精确度、召回率和F1-score，评估模型的性能。
tldr: 本文提出了一种基于机器学习的方法，使用多个来源的高质量数据和适当的特征选择以预测太阳能发电量。支持向量机、随机森林和梯度提升是这种方法中使用的机器学习算法。该方法的最终表现高度准确，使用99%的AUC指标进行评估。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes a machine learning-based approach for predicting solar power generation with high accuracy, using high-quality data from multiple sources and relevant feature selection. Support Vector Machines, Random Forest, and Gradient Boosting are employed as machine learning algorithms. The approach achieves high accuracy with a 99% AUC metric.
